title: June Metal Type News
content:
The June edition of the Metal Type newsletter is now out.

This month’s video was filmed in the grounds of Metal Type HQ (OK, my back garden!) and there’s a chance to see some letterpress equipment and type that I’ve recently saved from the scrap-heap - it’s all looking for good homes. Some of the larger items are only available for collection from York here in the UK.

If there’s anything you fancy please get in touch.

Click the link below to take a look:  
 [http://www.metaltype.co.uk/rail/clicks/click.php?id=17](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605033741/http:/www.metaltype.co.uk/rail/clicks/click.php?id=17 "http://www.metaltype.co.uk/rail/clicks/click.php?id=17")

=============================

METAL TYPE CLASSIFIEDS

Don’t forget you can always place a free ad on Metal Type.

[http://www.metaltype.co.uk/cgi-bin/suite/classifieds/classifieds.cgi](http://web.archive.org/web/20080605033741/http:/www.metaltype.co.uk/cgi-bin/suite/classifieds/classifieds.cgi "http://www.metaltype.co.uk/cgi-bin/suite/classifieds/classifieds.cgi")

==============================

All the Best  
Dave Hughes
